divs: Sighting DetailsA friend took a picture of the full moon on that date through their closed kitchen window. The thumbnail size photo in the camera showed a glow on the right side of the photo. It wasn't until I downloaded the photo to the computer and looked at the enlarged picture where the images showed what that glow was. I thought it was a reflection of their kitchen light but they do not have any fixtures in their home that matches the photo. I also considered a possible double exposier but, can that happen with a digital camera ? Also, this person is just a novice picture taker. I'm not sure what it is, so I'm sharing with the you, the experts.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Runnemede
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Glowing image discovered in a photo taken of a full moon
